review_data.title: Just amazing food. If you look for proper Italy in Zurich look no further!! The Ragu is divine the cocktails fantastic.
review_data.content: Divine food that is as close as it gets to Italian fare in Zürich. Loved the Ragu loved the passion for food. Also try to cocktails they are great.

review_data.title: Great Italian restaurant: worth the detour (it’s off the beaten track)
review_data.content: Stylish Italian restaurant, off the beaten track but worth the detour. Used to be Caduff’s Wine Loft. Complete makeover and it’s a stylish Italian restaurant with great starters such as fried squid, fried courgette flowers, baby artichoke salad. Main courses centre around interesting pizzas and...More

review_data.title: Ganz ok
review_data.content: Optisch schönes Lokal,nach dem Covid Zertifikat wurde nicht gefragt.Pizza war ganz ok aber viel zu teuer.Muss nicht wieder sein.

review_data.title: Like in Italy
review_data.content: Chef Yonatan made me go to Italy last night - not an easy thing! This restaurant is a must. The pasta was all home made the ingredients come directly from sustainable producers in Italy. I never had an Italian meal in Zurich that brought out...More

review_data.title: Knusprige Pizzen!
review_data.content: Essen kam schnell, knusprige, originelle Pizzen und wunderschöne Sonnenterrasse mit ästhetischen Sonnenschirmen! Allgemein schönes Interior.

review_data.title: Underwhelming
review_data.content: The setting is ok, but lacks the spirit from when it was Caduff's wine loft. Pizzaiolo was the high light of our visit, as he offered us a free white pizza while we were waiting to be seated. This was back in June. The pasta...More

review_data.title: Excellent cocktails and food
review_data.content: Excellent cocktails from the bar man Marco, the pizza was fantastic! The service too, I hope that the food menu will be bigger after corona. We loved it! We Will be back.

review_data.title: Fun evening with good food and great cocktails
review_data.content: Stylish restaurant with friendly service, fitting music and good food. Will have to come back to try the Pizza.
